title: Ask Riot: Haz keys, no haz bugs please?

replies.body: Could you add in some kind of way to know when your key drop rate will reset?
at the start of each month

That is actually incorrect, the drop rate of keys resets a month after you have earned you first key fragment after a reset. So unless you got your first fragment on the 1st of a month, then it will be another day. The reset is different for everyone

It's always the 6th or 7th for me because the update came out during the 6th and I immediately got a key.
It's 6-7th of each month for most people
Some people still don't play on the day of the patch so it isn't the same for all.

> [{quoted}](name=epiclegend0669,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=1hJst1oV,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-15T23:17:31.976+0000)
>
> Some people still don't play on the day of the patch so it isn't the same for all.

That's why I said most. Cmon dude read
This truly needs to be done. Too many times have i felt ripped off by not getting a fragment for four weeks and being like wtf.
There is no reset I think. It's just random. Take this example. In certain MMO's, you can earn drops from dungeons. This is similar, except the drop rate fluxuates per game depending on your wins.

No there is a rate that gets reset. It works like this
You get a key fragment, which in turn will make the next harder to get and so on. After a month after you have gotten your first key fragment the rate will reset allowing you to earn them easier
Why does an official riot post have 9 typos?

Riot, unlike many big companies, has the good will to communicate with its' community, and the one thing you manage to complain about is _typos?_ REALLY? 

(Edit): You DO realize that Rioters can be normal people, just like you or I, right?
Even with all of Riot's "good will communication," they still manage to comply with the community's wishes LESS then other big companies, lmao.
less THAN*

Riot has one of the most vocal admins in the history of any game. I've played just about everything, and the only thing that comes even moderately close is Early 2000's runescape mods, World of Warcraft very early on, and a few others maybe, but to pretend like they don't do daily post on the forums, like they don't respond to almost everything reasonable, that's just bullshit.

Voicing out and being active as an admin means jack shit when you don't actually do shit the community wants.

Remember SoloQ?

 Yeah, me too.

The reason Riot doesn't always do what the community wants is because a good portion of the time the community doesn't understand the effects their desires will put on the game. Riot has large analyst teams that collect data. This helps them make more informed decisions on what's best for the game. I don't think we do this when we just mindlessly demand things. Do you collect massive amounts of data to see if solo queue is better for the game or not?
Can you guys post a video of behind the scenes, like how did you guys created a certain skin, example project yi. That would be cool to see! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Very sorry to spoil your idea, but i THINK (Please correct if wrong) it's just Binary. e.e It would be cool if it weren't and I'm completely wrong but it is a game on a computer...
I believe, at this day and age, they are probably programming with a code like Java or C++. While it's still tedious, it's a lot faster than a bunch of 1s and 0s.
I really want to know where Brand got his trousers. They are durable, they don't burn and they look dope as hell

they're the pants of the guy he's possessing
they are kept unburnt by the will of the ESRB
Sorry, but I need an official confirmation of that
They're great! They're Brand name pants. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

"It is possible to earn enough key fragments to open every chest you find in 4 week period."

Yeah Rito, tell that to the past 2 months I've gone without a single key shard. :')
Wow. You must lose a LOT.
Because op.gg isn't a thing. xD
I'm pretty sure the Bronze with a 45% win rate and negative KDA has different work to be doing elsewhere. x'D

50% win rate isn't particularly bad...
Anything lower than 50% is though :D
im in the same boat as this dude and average around a 50-65% win rate  but it seems if you get an s it reduces your chance of a key drop even if u dont have boxes available
Grades and Keys have no effect on each other whatsoever
Getting an S does not reduce the key drop rate. I got a box AND a key once -- but it was my ADC, not me, who scored the S.
I love all the new skins n all but what happen to the old fun and simple 520 rp skins? Like lumberjack sion.

Is it possible to add in the grading system to "match history?" I'm really sick of not being able to connect to the stats screen or misclicking the "home" button and never seeing what grade i got ever again

Riot, for the mastery system remove cs from the support role because im a support main and its really hard to get an S-. took me 5 months to get lvl 6 thresh :P.Think you can make it happen?{{item:3070}} {{champion:412}} PS:Supports dont kill creeps
The lvl 6 and 7 haven't even been out for 5 months buddy

The CS isn't factored in support. I got an S- with {{champion:111}}  recently, and my my stats were: 1/2/21, 67 CS, 10.2K gold.

Note that I have the lowest gold in my team (highest at 17.1K) and lowest CS (highest at 209) - both stats belonging to my fed ADC.

The game knows when you are a support and does not necessarily award you an S for kills or CS. Just get your ADC fed and be there for them, like the good support you are.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2240436543/35925826?tab=overview
It's not really fixed.. I went 1/3/24 yesterday with like 50 cs in a 30 minute game, I got my team so fed cause i was landing hooks left and right but still, only an A+

Key drop rates have been borked for me (and my friends) since inception. Either that or we're grossly misunderstanding how they drop.

After a reset, the first ~16 wins (3-4 days or so) will usually drop 7-9 key fragments. After that, we may get 1-2 key fragments total over the next couple days. Then we get *nothing* at all until the next reset. Based on the information presented, it sounds like we should be able to get 12 key fragments per month, but we cap out at ~8-11. I understand they get less frequent, but we get everything within the first week and nothing afterwards...we could have 100 more wins and not see a single drop. That sounds like something is broken to me.
But 3 key fragments per key X 4 chests per 4 week period = 12 fragments though...where'd you get 16?

I have 4 keys and no chest but when I open chest, I get champion shard....
